root.name: King of Kings
root.description: OverviewKing of Kings, not to be mistaken for the unlicensed NES bible game, is a fantasy-themed strategy game from Atlus. It plays something like Famicom/Advance Wars or Daisenryaku, where the goal is to quickly conquer locations by producing a lot of units each turn and sending them against enemy forces. As with those games, there is also a little close-up graphic of the two units whenever they meet for battle, which shows how the two sides are faring in the conflict.

similar_games.game: Ogre Battle: The March of the Black Queen
